meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>song</kanji> <kanji>dance</kanji> <kanji>deed</kanji> is a deed you do that involves singing and dancing. This is the traditional form of stage deeds, known as <vocabulary>kabuki</vocabulary>. Watch it on YouTube if you want a taste.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
